          <title>
            <string language="en">Vehicles</string>
            <string language="fi">Liikennevälineet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Träger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Véhicules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Veículos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Veicoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οχήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vehículos</string>
          </title>
          <language>ru</language>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A connection exercise where the Russian names of vehicles are connected to the correct Finnish translation.</string>
            <string language="fi">Yhdistelytehtävä, jossa liikennevälineiden venäjänkieliset nimet yhdistetään oikeaan suomennokseen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">Opetushallitus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anschlußübung, in der die russischen Namen 
der Träger an die korrekte finnische Übersetzung angeschlossen 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un exercice de connexion où les noms russes des 
véhicules sont reliés à la traduction finlandaise correcte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício da conexão onde os nomes russian 
dos veículos sejam conectados à tradução finnish correta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esercitazione del collegamento dove i nomi 
russi dei veicoli sono collegati alla traduzione finlandese corretta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια άσκηση σύνδεσης όπου τα ρωσικά ονόματα των 
οχημάτων συνδέονται με τη σωστή φινλανδική μετάφραση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ejercicio de la conexión donde los nombres 
rusos de vehículos están conectados con la traducción finlandesa 
correcta.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
